basics.name: Allie Kim
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am pursuing a B.S. in Computer Engineering in the College of Engineering at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring 2017.

work.summary: Helped with development of tools to automate software supply chain procedures
highlights: Designed mySQL database to capture survey information allowing business units to assess their applications' ability to function on the cloud
Collaborated with IT team to implement a system to automate product ID catalog using Microsoft AX

work.summary: Develop hardware and software solutions to help facilitate research projects of the environmental design and research lab
highlights: Developing Rasperry Pi program using Python to allow for the gathering of environmental data from various types of sensors
Setup network of sensors to monitor effects of cooling panels on comfort levels

volunteer.organization: IEEE Student Branch at UH Manoa
volunteer.summary: Assist the Chair in leading board members and planning professional and social events for the EE student body
highlights: Served as co-chair on planning committee for annual EE banquet

volunteer.organization: Eta Kappa Nu Delta Omega Chapter
volunteer.summary: Assist the President in carrying out tasks for club and pledge events
highlights: Assisting in mentoring freshman engineering students in annual Holmes Hall Challenge

awards.title: University of Hawaii Regents' Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to 21 Hawaii high school seniors who have a record of academic achievement and extracurricular involvement

awards.title: Cisco Supply Chain Intern Case Competition
awards.summary: My team was awarded second place out of five teams for our innovative yet feasible proposal to improve customer satisfaction and reduce customer expedite volume
